heading: Programs built for every body.
intro: Choose the experience that matches your goals. Each track is designed to deliver strength, stamina, and confidence — always supported by our coaching team.

programs.name: Functional Strength Training
programs.description: Build real-world strength through compound movements, progressive overload, and expert form coaching. Perfect for athletes and serious lifters.
benefits: Compound lifts and movement coaching (squats, deadlifts, presses)
Weekly PR tracking and mobility warm-ups
Small group attention capped at 12 athletes
Periodized programming for continuous progress
Injury prevention through proper technique
Strength assessments every 8 weeks
programs.schedule: Mon/Wed/Fri: 6:00 AM, 7:00 PM | Tue/Thu: 6:30 PM | Sat: 8:00 AM

programs.name: HIIT & Bootcamp
programs.description: High-intensity interval training that torches calories, builds endurance, and keeps you coming back for more. No two classes are the same.
benefits: Cardio conditioning with interval training
Team challenges that keep energy high
Coach-led scaling for all fitness levels
Kettlebell, battle ropes, and bodyweight circuits
Calorie burn: 400-600 per session
Perfect for weight loss and cardiovascular health

programs.name: Yoga & Core Conditioning
programs.description: Vinyasa flows and core work that restore mobility, build stability, and calm the nervous system. Perfect complement to strength training.
benefits: Breath-led flows to improve mobility
Core stability drills to protect your spine
Calming cooldowns for nervous system reset
Hip and shoulder mobility for better lifting
Stress relief and mental clarity
Injury prevention and recovery
programs.schedule: Mon/Wed/Fri: 6:30 AM, 6:30 PM | Tue/Thu: 7:00 AM | Sat: 7:30 AM

programs.name: Personal Coaching (1-on-1)
programs.description: Fully customized training and nutrition plans designed around your goals, schedule, and lifestyle. Maximum results in minimum time.
benefits: Individual assessments and tailored programming
Nutrition check-ins and habit coaching
Flexible scheduling to match your calendar
Body composition tracking and progress photos
Goal setting and accountability check-ins
Access to all group classes included
programs.schedule: Flexible - Book sessions based on your availability
